Text: can you send me an invite for sceneunderground? im an avid downloader of your uploads ,,and can u upload fringe season 1 to latest? thanks dtruth33441@yahoo.com is my ead

I would send you Invite. And no, unfortunately I am unable to do Fringe again. It's gone (everyone knows why and when) and I currently cannot have enough HDD space to get probably 1 Terabyte sources of old Fringe episodes and upload/seed abilities to seed it almost indefinitely long, because TPB turned into download, not sharing place (due to 99.98% Hit&Run).

But - for a fact - I know how Fringe exists in many shapes all over Internet. You just need to find it.
